title: The Schoyen Manuscript Collection
content:
You may all be aware of this website, but just in case you weren't i thought i'd share this typographic (or should that be glyphic for non-printed letterforms?) goldmine of inspiration i found purely by chance...

[http://www.nb.no/baser/schoyen/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417034743/http:/www.nb.no/baser/schoyen/index.html "http://www.nb.no/baser/schoyen/index.html")

It seems picky to say, because the content speaks for itself, but it's a bit of a shame the website design doesn't really do it justice. If i weren't so busy i might offer a pro bono make over :)

Here's a small sample of the wonderous beauties that lay within...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417034743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AristotelesEthics600w_5236.jpg)

...i feel so talentless. Well, at least digitally fraudulent. All hail the scribe.
author: wormwood
